template.name: apib
template.value: @api {method} /url_rule/ Short Name * @apiVersion 1.0.0 * @apiName SomeName * @apiGroup Name * * @apiDescription Api description. * * @apiHeader (Object) {String} Accept-Encoding Accepting formats. * @apiHeaderExample {json} Header-Example: * { * "Accept-Encoding": "Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate" * } * * @apiParam {Number} param1 Description of param1. * @apiParam {String} param2 Description of param2. * @apiParam {String} param3=1 Description of param3 with default value. * @apiParam {Object} [param4=null] Description of optional param4 with default value. * * @apiSuccess {String} param1 Param1 description. * @apiSuccess {String} param2 Param2 description. * * @apiSuccessExample Success-Response: * HTTP/1.1 200 OK * { * "param1": "Param1 value", * "param2": "Param2 value" * } * * @apiError ObjectNotFound The id of the Object was not found. * * @apiErrorExample Error-Response: * HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found * { * "error": "ObjectNotFound" * } * * @apiPermission name
